title: Las Vegas Senior Classic
text:
The Las Vegas Senior Classic was a <a href="golf">golf</a> tournament on the <a href="Champions%20Tour">Champions Tour</a> from 1986–2001. It was played in <a href="Las%20Vegas%2C%20Nevada">Las Vegas, Nevada</a> at the <a href="Desert%20Inn%20Country%20Club">Desert Inn Country Club</a> (1986–1993) and at the TPC at The Canyons, now known as <a href="TPC%20Las%20Vegas">TPC Las Vegas</a>, from 1994–2001.
The purse for the 2001 tournament was US$1,400,000, with $210,000 going to the winner.
